Save Event adds the listing to your Favourites page (for easy retrieval)
Calendar notes the event details in your selected Calendar application
Map Event shows the location of the event on an interactive Google map
The Share icon on the action bar allows you to share the event using any installed messaging or email application
The Play icon on the action bar opens the artist\'s music in your preferred music or streaming client

imeacht is an app built by Brendan Dwyer, Conor Devoy, Devin Stacey, Jack Halpin and Patrick Harney
who are Computer Science students at the University College Dublin.\n\n
We created this app to allow people to discover new and fun things to do around their area and share them with their friends! All the information is supplied by eventful, you can check them out at www.eventful.com!.
